properties.description:
Follow these steps to configure your Azurehound integration:

 **Azure Tenant ID:** Enter your Azure Tenant ID.
 **Azure Application ID:** Register an application in Microsoft Entra ID. Grant it the following API permissions: Directory.Read.All, RoleManagement.Read.All, and provide admin consent.
 **Azure Secret ID:** Create a Client Secret for the registered app, and enter the secret value (not the ID).
 **BloodHound Instance Domain:** Enter your BloodHound instance domain name (exclude http:// or https://).
 **BloodHound Token ID:** Enter the Managed Client Token ID.
 **BloodHound Token Secret:** Enter the Managed Client Token Secret.
 Click **Next**, then **Review + Create**.
 After validation, click **Create** to begin deployment.
